ModMetaData.name: MTW_AncestorSpirits
ModMetaData.author: MoyTW
ModMetaData.description:
[WARNING]
This mod adds a hidden Faction! If loading it into an existing game, you *must* first load Orion's Faction Discovery mod! Note that Faction Discovery is *not* required to start a new game.
[WARNING]

Adds the sometimes grumpy spirits of your Ancestors!
